title: I Fine... Thank You... Love You
synopsis: Desperate to go to the U.S. to win back his girlfriend, Yim hires a tutor to teach him English. But things don't go according to plan.

title: Beyond the Clouds
synopsis: A youthful drug dealer in Mumbai must change his ways when the sister who raised him is assaulted by her boss and imprisoned for defending herself.

title: The Night Comes for Us
synopsis: After sparing a girl's life during a massacre, an elite Triad assassin is targeted by an onslaught of murderous gangsters.

title: Angela's Christmas
synopsis: A trip to church with her family on Christmas Eve gives young Angela an extraordinary idea. A heartwarming tale based on a story by Frank McCourt.

title: Gabriel and the Mountain
synopsis: In a drama based on a true story, Brazilian backpacker Gabriel Buchmann spends his gap year exploring Africa. Why does he die in the Malawi mountains?

title: Vir Das: Losing It
synopsis: The world's got a lot of problems, but Vir Das has a lot of answers as he discusses travel, religion, his childhood and more in this stand-up special.

title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu: Day of the Departed
synopsis: Cole finds himself trapped in Yang's temple after accidentally releasing a host of villainous spirits that the Ninja must defeat.

title: Soekarno
synopsis: This biographical drama about Indonesia's first president recounts his nationalist crusade to seize independence from Dutch colonial rule.

title: Quién te cantará
synopsis: When a near-drowning leaves a famous singer from the '90s with amnesia, she hires a karaoke singer who can imitate her to prep her for a comeback tour.

title: Vince and Kath and James
synopsis: Love can be complicated, especially when Vince agrees to secretly woo Kath via text on behalf of James -- while falling for her, too.

title: Everyday I Love You
synopsis: While patiently waiting for her boyfriend to come out of his coma, Audrey finds herself falling for the caring and successful Ethan.

title: Starting Over Again
synopsis: An architecture student and a history professor fall in love, pursue a dream, split up and bump into each other years later. Can there be a second chance?

title: I Am Maris
synopsis: Through her own words and art, a young woman details the healing power of yoga in her struggle with anorexia and her journey to self-acceptance.

title: The Dirt
synopsis: In this unflinching biopic based on Mötley Crüe's best-selling book, four LA misfits navigate the monster highs and savage lows of music superstardom.

title: ReMastered: The Miami Showband Massacre
synopsis: The killing of three members of the Miami Showband sent shock waves across Ireland in 1975. Now one survivor doggedly pursues the truth.

title: ReMastered: Devil at the Crossroads
synopsis: Cloaked in mystery, bluesman Robert Johnson left his mark on American music. Now family, critics and famous fans look for the real man behind the music.

title: The Wolf's Call
synopsis: With nuclear war looming, a military expert in underwater acoustics strives to prove things aren't as they seem -- or sound -- using only his ears.

title: Rocko's Modern Life: Static Cling
synopsis: After 20 years in space, Rocko struggles to adjust to life in 21st century O-Town and makes it his mission to get his favorite show back on the air.

title: Shadow
synopsis: As three kingdoms struggle for control of a walled city, a figure with a rare power spins a web of intrigue that entangles a king's court.

title: Karthik Calling Karthik
synopsis: Unlucky in love and bullied at work, an office drone is resigned to his dead-end life until it’s transformed by mysterious calls from … himself.

title: Last Ferry
synopsis: Seeking romance and friendship, a young gay lawyer travels to Fire Island in the off-season and is soon on the run after witnessing a murder.

title: The Platform
synopsis: In a prison where inmates on high floors eat better than those below, who get the scant scraps, one man tries to effect change so everyone gets enough.

title: School Life
synopsis: In one of the poorest areas of Paris, a school counselor devotes herself to working with disadvantaged students, while facing challenges of her own.
